overview: Shiksha O Tripura is a Bengali film based on the Education System of Tripura, it was directed by Biswajit Das. In this film all the innovative steps taken by Government of Tripura have been highlighted. All the artists acted in this film belong to Tripura Pranab Kr Nath, Satirtha Debnath, Sourajit Acharjee, Gopal baishnab, Bikram Das etc....
title: Shiksha O Tripura
